backend/main.mo: Defines core types and structures for users, membership, publishing works, releases, recording projects, and artist development entities. Includes membership status utilities and shared actor-type definitions used across the backend.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs. Serves as a traceability record for rollout-related changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing upgrade-hardening, related-records handling, and query normalization behavior. Acts as a reference index for frontend component purposes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS custom properties for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading the root container and main.tsx module.
frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_EXECUTION_LOG.md: Provides timestamped evidence and logs for Rollout 21.7 Step 9.5 execution, including build, upgrade, and validation steps. Documents environment details and pre‑deployment checks.
frontend/ROLL_OUT_21_7_STEP_9_5_ARTIFACT: Stores raw build and command outputs referenced by the main 21.7 execution log. Serves as an artifact repository for long log data.
frontend/ROLLOUT_STEPS.md: Outlines completed and remaining rollout steps, including detailed Step 10 deployment and smoke‑test requirements. Serves as the master rollout plan for the Higgins Music Hub.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_1_21_2.md: Checklist for smoke testing after Rollout 21.1–21.2 focusing on route loading, authentication, and Edit Links dialog verification. Covers admin and non‑admin scenarios across all entity types.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_3_21_4.md: Checklist for smoke testing after Rollout 21.3–21.4 with emphasis on upgrade‑safe rendering and Edit Links dialogs. Validates functionality for admin and non‑admin users across all five detail routes.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_5_21_6.md: Smoke test checklist for rollout 21.5–21.6 verifying frontend load, authentication, detail routes, and Edit Links dialogs for admin and non-admin users.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7_SESSION_LOG.md: Session log template for recording principals, entity IDs, console output, and pass/fail results during the rollout 21.7 smoke test.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_21_7.md: Expanded smoke test for rollout 21.7 covering both roles, authorization gates, and validation of all five portal detail routes with ID logging.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_STEP_10_MAINNET.md: Mainnet post-deployment smoke test checklist confirming production readiness, authentication, authorization, and portal detail routes for both user roles.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack router routes, layout structure, and global error handling for the app.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Gates access based on user approval status and allows users to request approval.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Protects routes by checking authentication via Internet Identity and redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with fallback logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new users to complete their profile and saves profile data.
frontend/src/components/feedback/AccessD: Displays an access-denied card with an optional custom message.
frontend/src/components/feedback/EmptySt: Generic empty-state component with optional icon and action button.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorBa: Error banner that maps backend errors to user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Loading: Full‑screen skeleton loader used during data or auth loading.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top navigation header with logo and optional authentication button.
frontend/src/components/layout/PortalLay: Main portal layout with sidebar navigation, header, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/related/EditLink: Button component for triggering link-editing actions.
frontend/src/components/related/EditRela: Dialog component for editing related entity links, handling loading, errors, and multi-select lists for various entity types.
frontend/src/components/related/MultiSel: Searchable multi-select list with filtering and checkbox selection for entity options.
frontend/src/components/related/relatedR: Utility functions determining edit permissions based on identity, admin status, and record ownership.
frontend/src/components/related/RelatedR: Displays linked record summaries with label resolution based on user permissions, falling back to raw IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook fetching the current user's role and approval status via the actor, exposing admin and loading flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useLinkableEntityOpti: Provides a hook that returns linkable entity option lists, choosing between admin-wide data or caller-specific data with loading and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, approvals, and various entity types via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS and defines custom color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, configuring the React Query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the marketing landing page with a hero section, services overview, and login flow redirect.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminBoo: Explains how to bootstrap the first admin account using a secret token in the URL.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/AdminDas: Displays admin-only stats and recent items for memberships, works, releases, projects, and artists with loading and access control.
frontend/src/pages/portal/admin/RoleAssi: Admin-only page listing all known users and allowing role changes via a select control with immediate mutation updates.
frontend/src/pages/portal/artists/Artist: Displays a single artist development entry with related records and allows link editing based on user permissions.
Shows all artist development entries and lets admins create new ones through a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/ReleaseD: Detail view for a release with normalized fields, related-record linking, and edit permissions.
frontend/src/pages/portal/label/Releases: Lists all releases and provides an admin-only dialog to create new release entries.
frontend/src/pages/portal/memberships/Me: Displays and edits a single membership profile, including status, related entities, and link management with role-based permissions.
Lists all membership profiles and allows admins to create new ones through a dialog form.
frontend/src/pages/portal/publishing/Pub: Shows detailed publishing work information, supports editing notes, and manages links to related entities with permissions.
Displays the publishing catalog and provides an admin-only form to create new works with contributors and ownership splits.
frontend/src/pages/portal/recordings/Rec: Shows details for a recording project and allows editing of related links, with role-based edit restrictions.
React page that lists recording projects, shows loading state, and lets admins create new projects via a dialog form.
frontend/src/utils/arrays.ts: Utility helpers for safely normalizing and validating array-like values to avoid undefined/null issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL/hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates ownership split percentages, ensuring totals are non-negative and do not exceed 100.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION_RE: Template for documenting results of upgrade-safe linking tests and smoke tests across multiple rollouts, including failures and route status.
frontend/UPGRADE_LINKING_VERIFICATION.md: Manual QA checklist for verifying upgrade-safe related-record linking across all detail pages for admin and non-admin users.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, rollout history, known issues, and implemented features for the Higgins Music platform.
